article_title: Panel to Back Modest Changes to Pilot Training, Psychological Monitoring
article_text:
A pan-European advisory panel is set to endorse relatively modest changes in the training and psychological monitoring of the region’s airline pilots in response to the fatal crash of a Germanwings flight in March, according to industry and government officials.

The proposals are slated to be presented to the European Union’s commissioner for transport on Thursday and publicly released Friday. One of the most important measures, the...
